title: Honor those who fell to Omega Squad Teemo

replies.body: Just reloaded  $100 RP and it's about to be gone again smh

Ah, need some money, my friends? {{champion:201}} 
Well then, just follow these few steps.
1: Drive to Walmart
2: Apply for a job. At Walmart.
3: Work at Walmart for 1-2 weeks.
4: Receive first Walmart paycheck.
5: Quit working at Walmart and run as fast as you can to the nearest Game-stop for an RP Card of your liking. 
6: Buy skins and never work at Walmart again.
Anyone else read that in a {{champion:201}} Voice?
If you didn't then you don't Stand behind {{champion:201}} .
Now i read everything in a braum voice. Thanks! Keep your heart beating. Because your heart is the strongest muscle! {{champion:201}}
Your tongue is the strongest muscle for it's size. If you had 2 tongues as thighs you wouldn't be able to stand up

The strongest muscle is based off of perception. If we're talking about the amount of work done, then it's the heart. If we're talking about the amount of force you can exert on something, it's your jaw muscle. If we're talking about the largest, then it's the glute. If we're talking about what can pull with the greatest force, its the soleus just below the calf. The list goes on.
Your tongue is the strongest muscle
Doesn't Walmart sell RP cards?
BRAUM DOES NOT THINK SO

Well, I buy all my RP cards there.

But now reality is making me disagree with Braum? Nah.
Why not ask Walmart if they can pay you with RP cards.
Better give muney to GameStop than Walmart 8D
you don't pay tax at walmart or gamestop for rp cards anyway...
Why give money to Walmart and GameStop when u can give it to subway and not have to pay tax?
but once youve quit why would you go back even if they did?
Gamestop charges me tax. Braum, I do not appreciate tax on Rp. I will stick to Walmart RP.
gamestop just hates that guy
Gamestop never charges me tax.

GameStop Manager here!{{champion:201}} 
 There isn't tax on these but there could be a state tax in some states that tax POSA cards such as LoL RP. I know for a fact these aren't federally taxed.{{item:2050}}

I don't think he actually killed her, and it was more of an accident by another person but with this version of Teemo showing no care in Tristana it is completely possible. {{champion:68}} Now we have an excuse for a REVENGE RUMBLE skin

and what about the people who already have had these skins from the first time you opened the legacy vault? 
I know you are giving special things to original owners but back when I bought all these skins it was implied that they wouldn't be taken out of the legacy vault ever again
Legacy skins *always* come back. You just misunderstood how Legacy was different than limited edition (such as Urf Warwick or PAX Jax).

Ahh but Championship skins are Limited, so if lets say 5th championship champ comes out
there will be a bundle ulnocking them as a one buy one for all? {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}}
they gave away championship riven at s4 worlds. i was there
I call bullshit. They have never said legacy vault would remain closed forever. You might be thinking about "limited edition" skins, which is completely different.
Which even now Limited Edition isn't safe from them just offering them again and giving a middle finger to the original purchasers.

Which honestly isn't that big of a deal. Considering that when the original purchasers leave the game those skins would never be seen again unless they re-released them. Which in my opinion if nobody ever sees them its a big fuck you to the artists that took the time to make them.

Also I know that I'd be bummed if I could never have a chance to purchase a certain skin just because I joined the game too late.

(Please note that I don't condone the re-release of ranked rewards. Those were earned. But the limited time only to buy? Those can be fair game.)
